G G7 Take a look back at the face you were wearing C G Take a look at the ways you have become Em Bm
is there something deep down we are avoiding C D G that makes it hard to be in silence or the sun

There was a moment when I thought I saw the future what were you doing there wearing a grin maybe it was just another hopeful daydream I mostly think of nothing to begin

Chorus C G There was only one option under C G the price that you’d survive

C G
makes you stop and wander C D G how in the first place we’d arrive

Tomorrows always coming like a strange invasion Can there an answer thats right but isn’t true I’m not sure I like it but I had a great nightmare I saw you crying but it wasn’t really you
